summary: Racemenu preset that includes the likeness of a beautiful young woman from the "ghost hunters" reality TV show.
descriptionHtml:
[b]This mod is a racemenu preset for the female nord (your character MUST be a female nord) that includes the likeness of Ashley Troub, who was on a few episodes of the long-running SyFy channel paranormal-themed reality television show "ghost hunters," I'm sure you don't know who she is, so a quick google search about her wouldn't hurt. [/b]

[b]Ashley has a very exotic appearance, including blue and purple hair, strange hairstyles, excessive makeup, flashy jewelry, and a strangely shaped nose and chin, but has stunningly beautiful features that are almost too perfect to be real and are very mannequin-like.

If you're interested in making your female Skyrim character look like a model from a Victoria's secret magazine makeup ad, then this is the character preset for you!

Ashley is very unique, and in a good kind of way, I'm sure you'll love this![/b]

[color=#00ff00]===INSTALLATION===
[b]Step 1. After downloading this file, go into the directory [i]my computer/local disk/program files x86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets[/i] and copy and paste the file ashley troub.jslot into there.

Step 2. Boot the game up, go into racemenu by typing "showracemenu" in the
console, then click "presets" on the bar in the top right of the screen,
and press F9 to load presets and load "ashley troub.jslot" (it should be
in there) and voila, there you are![/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000]===REQUIREMENTS===
*SKSE 1.7.2 or above
*Racemenu (latest version)
*Xenius Character Enhancement Compilation Pack <---- XCE Compilation Pack is not 100% necessary but is strongly recommended!
*The Eyes Of Beauty - The Eyes Of Beauty Player (for the dark green eyes)
*ApachiiSkyhair (for the hair)
*SG Female Eyebrows (for the brows)

Make 100% sure that you have the above mods installed before playing this or else this will not work properly![/color]

[color=#00ffff][b]===Optional/Recommended===
Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP
Bracelets By Ezuka
Sexy Swimsuit and bikinis for CBBE
Wedding Rings By Ezuka
FNIS Sexy Walk/FNIS 5.2[/b][/color]
author: Kutt
